oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Uncle Mark Thrash
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full-length, brown-toned photograph of Mark Thrash posing next to a log cabin. He is wearing a coat that was given to him by General Grant. Features a white border and narrative on obverse. [No. I-V-139]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Men; Log cabins
